title: Place
description: A place in a Petri net, which can hold tokens.

entry_region_id.description: Identifier of the entry region this place belongs to.

exit_region_id.description: Identifier of the exit region this place belongs to.

label.description: Label for the place, used for display purposes.

duration.description: Duration associated with the place, if applicable.

items.description: Identifier of the impact associated with this place.

impacts.description: vector of impacts associated with the place.

region_type.description: Type of region this place belongs to, either 'region' or 'subregion'.
